crops.name: Wheat
crops.description: Wheat is a cereal grain and a staple food used to make flour for bread, pasta, pastry, and more.
crops.climate: Cool, dry climate with moderate rainfall

crops.name: Rice
crops.description: Rice is a staple food for more than half of the world's population and thrives in wet environments.
crops.climate: Hot and humid with high rainfall

crops.name: Maize
crops.description: Maize, or corn, is used for food, fodder, and industrial purposes including ethanol production.

crops.name: Sugarcane
crops.description: Sugarcane is a tropical grass cultivated for its juice from which sugar is processed.
crops.climate: Hot and humid with high water requirements

crops.name: Cotton
crops.description: Cotton is a fiber crop used in the textile industry, growing best in warm climates.
